## VS Code Extension: Copilot Usage Status Widget

This extension displays GitHub Copilot usage statistics in the VS Code status bar.

### Project Checklist

- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Get project setup info
- [x] Scaffold VS Code extension project
- [x] Implement status bar widget
- [x] Install dependencies and compile
- [x] Ready to test the extension

### Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow VS Code extension best practices
- Keep the status bar item lightweight and performant
